summary:
Trilingual professional (English, Ukrainian, and Russian) with overall 6 years of experience in customer service, sales support and account management. Strong expertise in devising customer response strategies, forging solid account relationships, and maintaining superior customer service. An energetic and resourceful individual who excels in fast-paced environments and strives to go the extra mile to achieve the best results. Possessing a strong sense of commitment to top-flight quality,  business development and client relationship management.
Proven track record of managing overall customer service functionality to propel business loyalty, productivity and growth. Currently seeking new and exciting opportunities whereby I can harness my existing skills whilst continuing to develop.
